attributes.action: ensure that people feel safe in this country and that the government protects law-abiding citizens
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: It is becoming evident that the police force is unable to safeguard the public because the Government is more interested in passing laws which protect the criminals' human rights rather than those of law-abiding citizens.  I believe that law is breaking down and the Government is more interested in manipulating statistics and fulfilling quotas than it is in providing a duty of care.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
